<Box>
									<SolaceGrid container spacing={1}>
										<SolaceGrid item xs={7}>
											<SolaceTypography color={"error"}>
												{selectedRowData?.state === ConnectorState.error
													? en.connectors.labels.errorStateMessage
													: en.connectors.labels.downStateMessage}
											</SolaceTypography>
											{selectedRowData?.state === ConnectorState.error && (
												<SolaceTypography color={"error"} sx={{ width: "90%", wordWrap: "break-word" }}>
													{selectedRowData.microIntegrationDeploymentDetail?.details?.details ?? "Unknown error"}
												</SolaceTypography>
											)}
											<SolaceTypography color={"error"}>
												{en.connectors.labels.additionalSupportMessage}
												<SolaceButton variant="link" href="https://solace-sso.solace.cloud/support/question">
													{en.connectors.buttons.contactSupport}
												</SolaceButton>
											</SolaceTypography>
										</SolaceGrid>
										<SolaceGrid item xs={5}>
											<Box style={{ whiteSpace: "nowrap" }}>
												<SolaceButton variant="text" onClick={handleViewErrorLogs}>
													{en.connectors.buttons.viewErrorLogs}
												</SolaceButton>
											</Box>
										</SolaceGrid>
									</SolaceGrid>
								</Box>
